attributes.action: ensure that the government subsidy for the National Federation of Sea Anglers is maintained through the life of this parliament and beyond.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The National Federation of Sea Anglers is the recognised collective voice of some two million voters in the UK. Given the government's declared support for including all stake holders in recent marine environment legislations. To remove the subsidy for anglers representation appears to be a clear attempt to remove freedom of opposition to legislation in favour of commercial interests.
